mapper.select: SELECT aa.phoneid,IFNULL(bb.counts,0) FROM ( SELECT b.phoneid FROM t_phone_info b WHERE b.phoneid NOT IN (SELECT c.phoneid FROM t_task_detailinfo c WHERE c.taskkeynum =#{taskkeynum} AND c.taskdate=#{taskdate} ) AND b.phonestate='1') aa LEFT JOIN (SELECT phoneid, COUNT(1) AS counts FROM t_task_detailinfo GROUP BY phoneid) bb ON aa.phoneid=bb.phoneid ORDER BY BB.COUNTS,PHONEID LIMIT 0,1
